items.title: PhotonCam_OSK_20250405_182025
items.content_html: The image features a large bowl filled with a delicious-looking noodle dish, placed on a dining table. The dish contains noodles, meat, and vegetables, creating a mouth-watering meal. A glass of beer is also present on the table, adding to the enjoyable atmosphere. In addition to the main dish, there are a few carrots scattered around the table, possibly as a side dish or garnish. A spoon can be seen resting near the bowl, ready to be used for serving the noodles. The dining table occupies most of the image, emphasizing the inviting and appetizing nature of the meal.

items.title: IMG_8141
items.content_html: The image features a large window in an office space, offering a beautiful view of mountains in the distance. The office is equipped with multiple computers, including a desktop computer, a laptop, and a monitor. There are also several keyboards and mice placed around the workspace. In addition to the computers, there are a few bottles and cups scattered around the room, suggesting that the employees might be enjoying a drink while working. A chair is positioned near the desk, ready for someone to sit down and get to work. The overall atmosphere of the office appears to be relaxed and comfortable, with the stunning mountain view as a backdrop.

items.title: DSCF7703
items.content_html: The image depicts a busy city street with a red train track running through the middle of it. The street is lined with tall buildings, and there are several cars and buses driving down the road. In total, there are six cars and two buses visible in the scene. There are also numerous people walking along the street, with at least ten individuals visible in various positions. Some of them are carrying backpacks, and one person is holding a handbag. The scene captures the bustling atmosphere of a city street with both vehicular and pedestrian traffic.
